title: Floating Mockup
description: Ce style se caractérise par une esthétique de maquette (mockup) 3D ultra-propre et minimaliste, idéale pour la présentation professionnelle de produits. L'éclairage de studio doux et diffus crée des ombres portées réalistes sur un fond neutre, donnant l'impression que le sujet flotte élégamment dans l'espace avec une netteté cristalline.
prompt: A high-end professional product mockup featuring {{subject}} floating effortlessly in mid-air against a clean, neutral studio background. The visual style is ultra-minimalist and sleek, mimicking a premium 3D design template. The {{subject}} is rendered with a smooth, premium texture—either matte or satin—dominated by {{primary_color}} tones with subtle highlights in {{accent_color}}. The lighting is exquisite: soft, diffused studio softbox lighting that eliminates harsh glare but casts realistic, soft drop shadows on the floor far below to establish depth and volume. The composition is balanced with ample negative space to emphasize the object. The rendering is hyper-realistic, resembling a high-quality Cinema 4D or Blender Cycles render with global illumination, ambient occlusion, and ray-traced reflections. The atmosphere is commercial, polished, and pristine, focusing entirely on the form and design of the object, product photography, 3d render, octane render, studio lighting, soft shadows, clean background, minimalist, 8k, ultra detailed, commercial look, sharp focus, no noise.
background_prompt: A pristine, empty minimalist studio environment with a seamless infinite background. The setting features a soft, neutral gradient ranging from white to light grey, acting as a clean slate. Soft, diffused lighting creates a gentle atmosphere with subtle ambient occlusion. There are no central objects, just a clean, high-quality stage ready for product placement. The lighting setup suggests a softbox source from the top left, creating a smooth transition of light across the empty space, perfectly suited to complement a {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} color scheme without distraction.
